body_html:
Source website http://yann.lecun.com is down that why you get the issue.

You can download dataset via archive machine https://web.archive.org/web/20160828233817/http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/index.html and put it on corresponding log folder

body:
Source website http://yann.lecun.com is down that why you get the issue.

You can download dataset via _archive machine_ https://web.archive.org/web/20160828233817/http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/index.html and put it on corresponding log folder
